item.description:
The clean tech industry is repeatedly hailed as the key to US economic recovery. What part do new innovative water technologies play in that recovery? What are the financial, operational and regulatory issues surrounding new water technology products? What are venture capital firms and angel investors seeking from your water start up? What do you need to know as the CEO of a new water technology start up?

Goodwin Procter LLP invites you to attend a panel discussion moderated by partner Mark Burnett to explore these issues and more with leaders from the New England business community and others representing some of the most recent success stories in water technology.

Panelists will include:

Peter Rothstein, Executive-In-Residence, Flagship Ventures
Michael Bevin, Founder & Managing Director, Element Partners
Russ Landon, Managing Director, Canaccord Adams
Una Ryan, President & CEO, Waltham Technologies

Immediately following the panel will be two brief presentations by promising water technology startup companies.

Please note that for security purposes you must also RSVP to Goodwin Procter LLP by clicking here.

group.name: H2O Boston: Water and Energy Technology Meetup

item.name: WaterWays & Means
